text: Antonio Georgiev (; born 26 October 1997) is a Bulgarian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Tsarsko Selo Sofia. He has represented Bulgaria at U-19 and U-21 level. == References == == External links == * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian footballers Category:Bulgaria youth international footballers Category:Bulgaria under-21 international footballers Category:PFC Ludogorets Razgrad players Category:FC Botev Galabovo players Category:FC Tsarsko Selo players Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:Association football midfielders Category:People from Yambol
title: Antonio Georgiev
